channel.title: Hydrascape [24/7] - Custom Minigame! - Free week of Platinum Membership!
channel.description:
[CENTER][b]Like us on Facebook and leave your username in the comments for a Weeks free donation status![/b]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/m8myj7.png[/img]
[b][size=18pt]~ The Best Rs2 Emulator has returned and is here to stay! ~ [/size][/b] [b]What is Hydrascape and what makes it different from any other Server?[/b]
Hydrascape is the most Realistic Runescape Private Server in history, It was once the biggest and Largest Private Server around with over 200 Players on at ALL times and maxing over 500+ players online at one time! It has been running for over 4 years and is now up and running and online and ready for you ALL to play!
Hydrascape features some of the most popular and unique minigames in the history of Runescape Private Servers. Hydrascape doesn't just use any standard minigames that most servers can rip code from a source, they are all custom coded and UNIQUE to Hydrascape itself. It features 'Battle' where you must defend yourself and others against the foul monsters that attack you, there is also a game called 'ZombiesX' which is very similar to the Nazi Zombie game on Black ops!
[b]PLEASE NOTE YOU MAY HAVE TO REGISTER TO VIEW SOME OF THE FOLLOWING LINKS[/b]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/21dq2hi.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.hydra-scape.org/forum.php"]Click here to visit the forums![/URL]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/33eifls.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.hydra-scape.org/?pageid=playnow"]Click here to play the webclient![/URL]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/33eifls.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.hydra-scape.org/?pageid=playnow"]Click here to download the client![/URL]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/e5l0eg.gif[/img][URL=http://"http://hydra-scape.org/highscore.php"]Click here to view the highscores![/URL]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/33m7pso.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.hydra-scape.org/showthread.php?212-The-Newcomers-Guide-Made-by-jack"]Click here to view the newcommers guide![/URL]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/wsd3p.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.hydra-scape.org/index.php?pageid=drops"]Click here to view the drop database![/URL]
A picture of the Hydrascape Client Screen -
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/fw6tfd.png[/img]
I'm now going to explain some of the main features of Hydrascape, that makes it what it is and unique to any other servers!
The gift system, every hour of playing you will receive gifts which could be something useless, to someone great. The longer you play the more likely you are to get rare items, /gift is how you check what you have and here's what you can get from it and more!
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/10x65fk.png[/img]
Another great part of this server is the minigames which are like no other, they are unique and special because they are 100% custom!
One of the minigames is called 'Battle' where you fight different monsters in a team to try reach the final wave, when you play this game you receive points to spend in the shop, here's what it looks like!
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2ro2asy.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/219dguv.png[/img]
Also, there is many other things that makes Hydrascape what it is, such as the shops, the games and quests. Here's a few sneak peaks!
You can play BlackJack to win double your money or maybe loose it!
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/c57k0.png[/img]
There's a link boat to take you to different places that will benefit you!
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/4vo0vp.png[/img]
Different places to train combat stats and a different section for skilling!
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/mkk5s5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/rc0j5y.png[/img]
Special and custom shops for the donaters and premium members of the server! Also includes many more benefits like new dungeons, different shops and more!
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/24zy51i.png[/img]
Custom interfaces that let you change your gameplay!
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/nx1h20.png[/img]
A special tab to get to different places, change spells, go to special places, training and minigames!
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/6sgns8.png[/img]
A desired tab just for PK'ing - lets you know how many points you have, the shops to spend your points in and quick teleports. Everytime you kill a player you get a certain amount of points, the higher the killstreak, the larger amount of points you get per kill!
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/k15e7n.png[/img]
The shop you can spend your points in!
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/sm3uzb.png[/img]
We also offer a unique voting store, every 24 hours you can vote for a vote token, they be traded for cash or exchanged in the shop for items!
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/fubam1.png[/img]
One of the greatest features of HydraScape is 'ZombiesX' - This game is so unique that no other server has it, it's just the same as Black Ops Zombies which I'm sure many of you people love! Here's some screenshots of the minigame!
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2requ0n.png[/img]
This is the shop that you can spend your ZombieX points in after you finish the game!
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/5dpe0n.png[/img]
Here's some more pictures!
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1zxcv4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/27zgg7s.png[/img]
There is also a mystery box that cost 950 points to use, you can receive items from it such as bronze longsword all the way up to statius warhammers and godswords!
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/ndnf9u.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2uf7ixf.png[/img]
You can also buy items from the floor with points like this!
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/9jkpxj.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/vxowok.png[/img]
[U][COLOR="Red"]PLEASE NOTE YOU MAY HAVE TO REGISTER TO VIEW SOME OF THE FOLLOWING LINKS[/COLOR][/U]]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/21dq2hi.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.hydra-scape.org/forum.php"]Click here to visit the forums![/URL]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/33eifls.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.hydra-scape.org/?pageid=playnow"]Click here to play the webclient![/URL]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/33eifls.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.hydra-scape.org/?pageid=playnow"]Click here to download the client![/URL]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/e5l0eg.gif[/img][URL=http://"http://hydra-scape.org/highscore.php"]Click here to view the highscores![/URL]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/33m7pso.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.hydra-scape.org/showthread.php?212-The-Newcomers-Guide-Made-by-jack"]Click here to view the newcommers guide![/URL]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/wsd3p.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.hydra-scape.org/index.php?pageid=drops"]Click here to view the drop database![/URL]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/28lcsp.png[/img]
So come along now and join the community! We look forward to seeing you!
[/CENTER]

item.title: Hydrascape [24/7] - Custom Minigame! - Free week of Platinum Membership!
item.dc:creator: @xEvilGSx xEvilGSx
item.description:
@xEvilGSx wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:10, topic:465403”][quote author=Fails link=topic=570583.msg4135061#msg4135061 date=1351614949]
Zombie minigame is nothing special, seeing as almost every server now-a-days has it. I don’t believe it belongs in the title, that’s just my personal opinion. You should include something… ‘unique’ in the title, that way when people come across it, they could possibly be more interested. (if that makes any sense)

Good luck advertising!
[/quote]

I had the idea of zombies before it became big

Actually the first few leeches started having zombies came after I released my zombie minigame tut[/quote]

Do you play Hydrascape?

Read full topic
item.source: Hydrascape [24/7] - Custom Minigame! - Free week of Platinum Membership!

item.title: Hydrascape [24/7] - Custom Minigame! - Free week of Platinum Membership!
item.dc:creator: @xEvilGSx xEvilGSx
item.description:
@xEvilGSx wrote:

[CENTER]Like us on Facebook and leave your username in the comments for a Weeks free donation status!

[size=18pt]~ The Best Rs2 Emulator has returned and is here to stay! ~
[/size]
What is Hydrascape and what makes it different from any other Server?

Hydrascape is the most Realistic Runescape Private Server in history, It was once the biggest and Largest Private Server around with over 200 Players on at ALL times and maxing over 500+ players online at one time! It has been running for over 4 years and is now up and running and online and ready for you ALL to play!

Hydrascape features some of the most popular and unique minigames in the history of Runescape Private Servers. Hydrascape doesn’t just use any standard minigames that most servers can rip code from a source, they are all custom coded and UNIQUE to Hydrascape itself. It features ‘Battle’ where you must defend yourself and others against the foul monsters that attack you, there is also a game called ‘ZombiesX’ which is very similar to the Nazi Zombie game on Black ops!

PLEASE NOTE YOU MAY HAVE TO REGISTER TO VIEW SOME OF THE FOLLOWING LINKS

Click here to visit the forums!

Click here to play the webclient!

Click here to download the client!

Click here to view the highscores!

Click here to view the newcommers guide!

Click here to view the drop database!

A picture of the Hydrascape Client Screen -

fw6tfd.png762×498

I’m now going to explain some of the main features of Hydrascape, that makes it what it is and unique to any other servers!

The gift system, every hour of playing you will receive gifts which could be something useless, to someone great. The longer you play the more likely you are to get rare items, /gift is how you check what you have and here’s what you can get from it and more!

Another great part of this server is the minigames which are like no other, they are unique and special because they are 100% custom!

One of the minigames is called ‘Battle’ where you fight different monsters in a team to try reach the final wave, when you play this game you receive points to spend in the shop, here’s what it looks like!

Also, there is many other things that makes Hydrascape what it is, such as the shops, the games and quests. Here’s a few sneak peaks!

You can play BlackJack to win double your money or maybe loose it!

There’s a link boat to take you to different places that will benefit you!

Different places to train combat stats and a different section for skilling!

Special and custom shops for the donaters and premium members of the server! Also includes many more benefits like new dungeons, different shops and more!

Custom interfaces that let you change your gameplay!

A special tab to get to different places, change spells, go to special places, training and minigames!

A desired tab just for PK’ing - lets you know how many points you have, the shops to spend your points in and quick teleports. Everytime you kill a player you get a certain amount of points, the higher the killstreak, the larger amount of points you get per kill!

The shop you can spend your points in!

We also offer a unique voting store, every 24 hours you can vote for a vote token, they be traded for cash or exchanged in the shop for items!

One of the greatest features of HydraScape is ‘ZombiesX’ - This game is so unique that no other server has it, it’s just the same as Black Ops Zombies which I’m sure many of you people love! Here’s some screenshots of the minigame!

This is the shop that you can spend your ZombieX points in after you finish the game!

Here’s some more pictures!

There is also a mystery box that cost 950 points to use, you can receive items from it such as bronze longsword all the way up to statius warhammers and godswords!

You can also buy items from the floor with points like this!

[COLOR=“Red”]PLEASE NOTE YOU MAY HAVE TO REGISTER TO VIEW SOME OF THE FOLLOWING LINKS[/COLOR]]

Click here to visit the forums!

Click here to play the webclient!

Click here to download the client!

Click here to view the highscores!

Click here to view the newcommers guide!

Click here to view the drop database!

So come along now and join the community! We look forward to seeing you!

[/CENTER]
